critical_notes: The genesis_hash MUST be computed as BLAKE3(hardware_id + public_key + salt)
All implementations (TypeScript, C++, Rust) MUST produce identical hashes
If hashes do not match, the network protocol is BROKEN
Salt may be empty string, but hardware_id and public_key are required
Public key is 32 bytes Ed25519 key encoded as 64 hex characters
Hardware ID is MAC address in format XX:XX:XX:XX:XX:XX
